sentences.en: Allow an extra 10-15 min if you prefer lamb well done.
sentences.cn: 如果想让羊羔肉完全熟透还需要再煮10到15分钟。

sentences.en: Employees said they would prefer more flexible working hours.
sentences.cn: 员工们说他们希望有更具弹性的工作时间。

sentences.en: I am not a country person at all. I prefer the cities.
sentences.cn: 我根本不喜欢乡村生活，我喜欢城市。

sentences.en: I prefer going to the cinema to watching TV.
sentences.cn: 我更喜欢看电影而不是看电视。

sentences.en: I still prefer to play in defence.
sentences.cn: 我还是更喜欢打防守。

sentences.en: I think more customers probably prefer a soft sell.
sentences.cn: 我认为更多的顾客也许更喜欢软性推销。

sentences.en: If you prefer mild flavours reduce or leave out the chilli.
sentences.cn: 如果喜欢清淡的口味，可少放或不放辣椒。

sentences.en: Most hostel tenants would prefer single to shared rooms.
sentences.cn: 住在招待所的人大多更喜欢单人间，而不想和别人共住一间。

sentences.en: Movie stars often prefer to travel incognito.
sentences.cn: 电影明星旅行时常喜欢隐瞒身份。

sentences.en: Or, if you prefer , you can email us.
sentences.cn: 或者，你喜欢的话，可以给我们发电子邮件。

sentences.en: Or, if you prefer, you can email us.
sentences.cn: 或者，你喜欢的话，可以给我们发电子邮件。

sentences.en: Other things being equal, most tenants would prefer single to shared rooms.
sentences.cn: 如果其他条件不变，大多数房客都愿意住单人间而不会选择与他人同住。

sentences.en: She prefers her coffee black.
sentences.cn: 她更喜欢喝黑咖啡。

sentences.en: the government’s preferred option
sentences.cn: 政府倾向的选择

sentences.en: The majority of people interviewed prefer TV to radio.
sentences.cn: 大多数接受采访的人都喜欢看电视多于听收音机。

sentences.en: They prefer to bargain with individual clients, for cash.
sentences.cn: 在现款方面，他们更愿意同散户打交道。

sentences.en: They prefer, in the end, to stick with what they know.
sentences.cn: 他们最终选择了继续做自己熟悉的事。

sentences.en: This type of owl prefers a desert habitat.
sentences.cn: 这种猫头鹰更喜欢沙漠的生活环境。

sentences.en: When planting seedlings I prefer to mark out the rows in advance.
sentences.cn: 种树苗的时候，我喜欢事先划出行来。

sentences.en: Whereas West Germans drink wine, their Eastern cousins prefer Schnapps.
sentences.cn: 西德人喝葡萄酒，而他们东德的兄弟姐妹则喜欢喝杜松子酒。

sentences.en: Which type of transport do you prefer?
sentences.cn: 你更喜欢哪种类型的代步工具？

words.tran_cn: 更好的，更可取的；更合意的

phrases.tran_cn: 宁可做某事；更喜欢做某事

trans.tran_en: to like someone or something more than someone or something else, so that you would choose it if you could
to like someone or something more than someone or something else, so that you would choose it if you could
